name: Finn's Friendly Adventure
description: Finn's Friendly Adventure is a 2D platform game designed for young children who want to learn!   The perfect gift for Christmas   Help Finn to get home through different exotic levels, the little ones will learn to count, to differentiate colours but also to write! Harvest the letters throughout the forest!    Explore the level to find the letters !  Look ! Those owl can be usefull !   Prepare the password to finish the level !    1. Help your new friend !  2. Punish the evil snakes !  3. Find your way home !    In this final world you will have to return the flags to their original colours to get home! Green, Blue and Red are the colours you have to find ! Producer Nicolas Blois Game Artist Kimberley Prunier Game Designers David Fernand | Pierre-Louis Dulieu Game Programmers Adrien Ribeiro | Mathieu Prevot | Nolan Jutard
